title: Wicked Demons 2
description: Life is reduced to chaos for Andi O'Day when her demon lovers return with a The hunters are coming. While trying to understand the alignments that stalk her, Andi soon finds herself in possession of a special gift that has the power to change Heaven, Hell, and everything in between...if she can only remember how to use it, and why.Confronted with sexy demons and impending doom, Andi struggles to be both demon and woman enough to hold her world together. Or start a war.
author: R.V. Asher
